module.name: functional_specification
module.keywords: module, functional specification, behavioural specification, signal, signal specification, test bench

abstract.p: the representation of the information needed to describe the behaviour of a functional element under a set of controlled conditions.
abstract.li: component data sheet functional performance representation;

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the information needed to describe the behaviour of a functional element under a set of controlled conditions.
purpose.note: It is typical to capture the information based on computer experiment but that is not required in this part of ISO 10303.
purpose.example: The information on a component data sheet that provides operating curves and tables can be represented using this part of ISO 10303 along with other parts of ISO 10303 to provide the mapping of pins from the functional unit to the component pin numbers, as the functional unit terminal names in this part of ISO 10303 are abstract and not tied to any particular realized product.

A characterization of an amplifier using a circuit level simulation application can be captured using this part of ISO 10303, with the time or frequency domain signal stimulus and response defined by an external user defined classification language or an IEC or IEEE standard.
